BBEX3.A.SGD.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Singapore / USD 1 = SGD ... (middle)
General: Under an agreement between Singapore and Brunei Darussalam, the Brunei dollar (convertible at par) is also accepted as legal tender.

Source: Since 2007 Monetary Authority of Singapore December 2001 - December 2006 Deutsche Bank, Singapore Branch 1997 - November 2001 BHF-Bank, Singapore Branch 1989 - 1996 The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Singapore
Methodology: Until December 2006, calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates, from 2007 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
